scripts.pod-install: cd ios && USE_FRAMEWORKS=static RCT_NEW_ARCH_ENABLED=1 bundle exec pod install
scripts.pod-install-hard: cd ios && rm -rf Podfile.lock && rm -rf Pods && rm -rf build && rm -rf ~/Library/Developer/Xcode/DerivedData && pod cache clean --all && USE_FRAMEWORKS=static RCT_NEW_ARCH_ENABLED=1 bundle exec pod install --repo-update
scripts.reset-hard: rm -rf node_modules ios/Pods ios/Podfile.lock ios/build android/app/build android/build ~/Library/Developer/Xcode/DerivedData && yarn cache clean && yarn && yarn pod-install-hard
scripts.reset: rm -rf node_modules ios/Pods ios/Podfile.lock ios/build android/app/build android/build && yarn cache clean && yarn
scripts.android:bump-version: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const file='android/app/build.gradle'; let content=fs.readFileSync(file,'utf8'); const match=content.match(/versionCode (\d+)/); const newVersion=parseInt(match[1])+1; content=content.replace(/versionCode \d+/,'versionCode '+newVersion); fs.writeFileSync(file,content); console.log('versionCode bumped to',newVersion);"
scripts.pod-install:fast: cd ios && FIREBASE_ENABLED=false USE_FRAMEWORKS=static RCT_NEW_ARCH_ENABLED=1 pod install
